headline: The AES Corporation (AES) Gains Amid Takeover Interest
summary: The share price of The AES Corporation (NYSE:AES) surged by 9.29% between July 7 and July 11, 2025, putting it among the Energy Stocks that Gained the Most This Week. The AES Corporation (NYSE:AES), together with its subsidiaries, operates as a power generation and utility company in the United States and internationally. The AES Corporation […]
